item.title: How to Be a Good Open Source üßë‚Äçüíªüåè
item.description: What’s the coolest thing about open source software? üí≠ If you need a new feature, you can just go ahead and add it yourself! Here are some tips I learned along the way: Add Value Make sure your contribution adds value to the project. Don’t just contribute because it’s trendy. Ask for Help Don’t expect to get everything right on the first try. Ask the project maintainers for feedback and guidance.
